text: Miss Mend () is a 1926 Soviet silent movie directed by Fyodor Otsep and Boris Barnet.Directed by…: 7 советских и постсоветских режиссеров, снимавших кино на ЗападеМисс Менд: Смерть по радио It stars Natalia Glan, Boris Barnet, and Vladimir Fogel. ==Actors== * Natalia Glan - Vivian Mend, secretary * Boris Barnet - Barnet Champion, tabloid-press reporter * Vladimir Fogel - Vogel, press-photographer * Igor Ilyinsky - Tom Hopkins, clerk * Ivan Koval-Samborski - Arthur Stern * Sergey Komarov - Chiche == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1926 movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Movies directed by Fyodor Otsep Category:Movies directed by Boris Barnet
title: Miss Mend
